about_the_game:
Ever wondered what it is like to be a butcher in Japan? Are you ready to chop some Yakiniku with the meat slicer, trim off the fat of a bone-in sirloin steak and manage your butcher shop economy while taking care of your customers? Butchanaifu is your chance to get an insight in the everyday life of Teru, a Japanese butcher, and face his daily challenges in a Pokemon-style mini-game filled casual simulator. You'll have tons of fun in this combination of Among Us and Overcooked, plus you'll learn a lot about butcher shops along the way! Happy slicing!

- Manage all orders to make the butcher shop profitable

- Multiple mini-games to prepare meat orders.

- Relaxing and pleasant music.

- 15 levels, to be expanded in the future
